original_text:
Do not trust a neighbor;
    put no confidence in a friend.
Even with the woman who lies in your embrace
    guard the words of your lips.
korean_text: 너희는 이웃을 믿지 말며 친구를 의지하지 말며 네 품에 누운 여인에게라도 네 입의 문을 지킬지어다

sentences.original_text: put no confidence in a friend
Even with the woman who lies in your embrace
guard the words of your lips
